Package index

Preprocessing

Functions for satellite data preprocessing

cfactor_BRDF()
c-factor BRDF normalization
preproc()
Satellite data pre-processing

Topographic correction

Functions for correcting surface reflectance for the effects of topography

cast_shadows()
Cast shadows
hill_shade()
Topographic hillshading
shadow_removal()
Topographic shadows
topo_corr()
Topographic correction
topo_splot()
Reflectance-IC scatterplot

Anisotropic correction

Functions for calculating the anisotropic reflection factors for different spectral bands and surface types (snow or ice)

f_BRDF()
Anisotropy correction of reflected radiation over melting snow and glacier ice
NDSII_hist()
NDSII histogram
snow_or_ice()
Automatic discrimination of snow and ice cover types

Narrow-to-broadband albedo conversion

Functions for calculating narrowband and broadband albedo from topographically-corrected surface reflectance

albedo_Knap() albedo_Liang() albedo_Feng()
Narrow-to-broadband albedo conversion
albedo_sat()
Satellite albedo retrieval
